\begin{table}
        \caption[Options for use with \texttt{capablanca}]{Options for use with \texttt{capablanca}.  Several of these are intended for debugging usage only.}
        \label{table:capablanca_ops}
        \centering
        \begin{tabular} {l p{0.6 \textwidth}}
            \hline \hline
            Option                    & Description \\ \hline
            \texttt{-c CONFIG.CFG}    & specify configuration file \\
            \texttt{-C}               & make problem cyclical in $x$- and $y$-directions \\
            \texttt{-d}               & suppress deposition \\
            \texttt{-h}               & display this help message \\
            \texttt{-E $\varphi$}     & specify potential $\varphi$ \\
            \texttt{-i $T$}           & specify $T$ steps between output files \\
            \texttt{-N}               & output XYZ file with neighbor count, not state \\
            \texttt{-n}               & force recalculation of nearest neighbors \\
            \texttt{-p DATAFILE.XYZ}  & specify particle position file \\
            \texttt{-R $s$}           & specify random seed $s$ \\
            \texttt{-r RULE\_SET.RS}  & specify rule set file \\
            \texttt{-S}               & force full surface calculation \\
            \texttt{-s}               & output surface at each time step as well \\
            \texttt{-T $\vartheta$}   & specify temperature $\vartheta$ \\
            \texttt{-t $\tau$}        & specify $\tau$ time steps to run \\
            \texttt{-V}               & use verbose output \\
            \texttt{-v}               & display version information \\
            \texttt{-z $Z$}           & specify coordination number $Z$ \\
        \end{tabular}
    \end{table}
